title: Goombario/Goombella

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Tattle**: Learn a target's alignment and subalignment.
- **Tips and Tricks**: Roleblock a Player you have previously Tattled, can be used alongside any action and on as many people as possible, but they gain roleblock immunity the next night. (Goombario exclusive)
- **Rally Wink** Pick a Koopa, they may use their night action twice, can only be used on Attackers/All-Rounders/Kings once, Day action. (Goombella exclusive)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, choose between Goombario or Goombella, Unlocking different abilities.
- You can only Roleblock each Tattled player twice.

desc:
Post 1450
*Goombario is a clever young Goomba adventurer who admires Mario.*
*Goombella is a smart, if sassy, Goomba girl. She hopes to be an archaeologist one day.*
